mapper.select: SELECT id, userName, gender, password, nick_name, qq_num, telephone_num, profile_pic, ability, class, control, college FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, userName, gender, password, nick_name, qq_num, telephone_num, profile_pic, ability, class, control, college) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{qqNum}, #{telephoneNum}, #{profilePic}, #{ability}, #{classNum}, #{control}, #{college})
